statements: SELECT * FROM ProcurementReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_spend FROM ProcurementReports WHERE department_id = 101;
SELECT report_id, report_name, cost_savings FROM ProcurementReports WHERE total_spend > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ProcurementReports WHERE department_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY total_spend DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_spend, cost_savings FROM ProcurementReports WHERE cost_savings IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ProcurementReports WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC, total_spend ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM ProcurementReports WHERE total_spend > 10000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, total_spend, cost_savings FROM ProcurementReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_spend DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT department_id, SUM(total_spend) AS total_expense FROM ProcurementReports GROUP BY department_id HAVING total_expense > 50000 ORDER BY total_expense DESC
SELECT report_id, report_name, total_spend, cost_savings FROM ProcurementReports WHERE report_name LIKE '%Quarterly%' AND cost_savings IS NOT NULL ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM procurement_reports WHERE total_savings > 1000;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM procurement_reports WHERE date_generated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT dept_name, amount_spent FROM procurement_spending WHERE amount_spent < 500;
SELECT * FROM procurement_spending ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, total_savings FROM procurement_reports WHERE total_savings BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT report_name, total_savings FROM procurement_reports WHERE total_savings > 10000
SELECT * FROM procurement_reports WHERE date_generated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT report_name, total_savings FROM procurement_reports WHERE date_generated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_savings DESC
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM procurement_reports ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT * FROM procurement_spending WHERE amount_spent > 50000 ORDER BY amount_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM ProcurementReports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM ProcurementReports ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT saving_amount, description FROM CostSavings WHERE saving_amount > 1000 ORDER BY saving_id ASC;
SELECT report_name, total_spending FROM ProcurementReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_name, report_date, total_spending FROM ProcurementReports WHERE total_spending > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT saving_id, saving_amount, description FROM CostSavings WHERE saving_amount < 1000 ORDER BY saving_amount DESC;
SELECT id, report_name, total_spending FROM ProcurementReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT id, item_name, amount FROM transactions WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT name, location, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Food';
SELECT id, amount_saved FROM savings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, location FROM vendors WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, category_name FROM categories WHERE LENGTH(category_name) > 5 ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT id, amount_saved, date FROM savings WHERE amount_saved < 500 ORDER BY amount_saved ASC, date DESC;
SELECT id, name, contact_email, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM procurement_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM procurement_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM procurement_products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, total_cost FROM procurement_orders WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM procurement_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM procurement_vendors WHERE vendor_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM procurement_products WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, total_cost FROM procurement_orders WHERE vendor_id = 5 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM procurement_reports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly Report' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
